alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:58PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marshall, northwestern Benton, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 1258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Collierville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Holly Springs, Lamar, Mt Pleasant, Red Banks, Slayden, Piperton, Rossville, Cayce, Elba, Victoria, Canadaville, Hudsonville, Early Grove, Taska, Kirk, Atway, Hays Crossing and Mack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
